---
title: Student Course Enrollment Template
description: Student Course Enrollment Template Documentation
---
import Badge from '@site/src/components/badges/badges';

**(24 Fields, 14 Collected, Delimited)**

**Target Table: `COURSE_ENROLL`**

| **Load Sequence/Dependencies** |
|--------------------------------|
| COURSE                         |
| STUDENT                        |
| COURSE INSTRUCTOR              |


## Template Description

The Student Course Enrollment Template contains information on student enrollment in each course/section combination. The Student Course Enrollment Template must be submitted in a cumulative fashion indicating all students enrolled in a specific section of a course for the school year.

## Template Specifications {#template-specs}

---
### 1 - SUBMITTING AUN
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={9} /></p>

The unique, 9-digit AUN assigned by the PDE.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

All LEA and School Numbers can be found on the [EdNA website](http://www.edna.pa.gov/Screens/wfHome.aspx).

`123456789`
</details>

**eScholar Name**: `DISTRICT CODE`

---
### 2 - SCHOOL NUMBER
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={4} /></p>

The PDE defined 4-digit code identifying the school.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

All LEA and School Numbers can be found on the [EdNA website](http://www.edna.pa.gov/Screens/wfHome.aspx).

`1234`
</details>

**eScholar Name**: `LOCATION CODE`

---
### 3 - SCHOOL YEAR DATE
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={10} /></p>

A single date (June 30), the last day of the current school year indicating the whole school year.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

`2024-06-30`
</details>

---
### 4 - ENROLLMENT PERIOD NUMBER
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={3} /></p>

The identification of the marking period entry that identifies the time period covered by the course/section combination; PDE will collect one enrollment period for the current SY.

:::warning[Business Rules:]
All LEAs should enter a value of `002` in the Enrollment Period Number field.
:::

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

`002`
</details>

---
### 5 - EFFECTIVE DATE
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={10} /></p>

The date on which the enrollment information becomes effective. If the actual entry date is unknown, the first day of the marking period should be used.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

`2023-09-01`
</details>

---
### 6 - ENROLLMENT CODE
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={6} /></p>

The enrollment code that indicates the type of enrollment transaction that occurred; only enrollment date is required at this time.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

`E1` – student enrolls in a course
</details>

---
### 7 - PASECUREID
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={10} /></p>

The unique, 10-digit PAsecureID assigned to the student.  Informs various indicators in the **Future Ready PA Index**.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

`1000000009`
</details>

**eScholar Name**: `STUDENT ID`

---
### 8-9
Fields not collected. Must be delimited in template file.

---
### 10 - REQUEST SEQUENCE
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={3} /></p>

Use the Request Sequence field to distinguish between enrollments in identical course/section combinations for the same student.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

`3`
</details>

---
### 11-12
Fields not collected. Must be delimited in template file.

---
### 13 - SUPPLEMENTARY COURSE DIFFERENTIATOR
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={2} /></p>

This field is used to help make a course unique where the same Course Code is offered in more than one-time period during the school year. This field will represent the general span of time in which a course and its sections are offered.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

See [Appendix O](docs/appendix/appendix-O.mdx) for a complete list of valid values.
</details>

---
### 14 - COURSE CODE LONG
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={12} /></p>

The unique, local, LEA-specific Course Code.

:::warning[Business Rules:]
- Courses may have multiple sections. Each course should have a single Course Code Long.   
- **Do not** assign separate course codes to sections of the same course.
:::

---
### 15 - COURSE DELIVERY MODEL CODE
<p><Badge color="optional" /> <Badge color="updateable" /> <Badge length={4} /></p>

The method used to deliver instruction to the student for this section of the Course Code.

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

- `0340` – in school
- `0341` – other K-12 educational institution
- `0342` – post-secondary facility
- `0752` – community facility
- `0754` – hospital
- `0997` – business
- `1111` – blended/hybrid
- `2192` – home
- `3018` – library/media center
- `9998` – online course
- `9999` – other
</details>

---
### 16-19
Fields not collected. Must be delimited in template file.

---
### 20 - SECTION CODE LONG
<p><Badge color="required" /> <Badge color="key" /> <Badge length={25} /></p>

Class section number assigned by LEA to identify distinct classes.

:::warning[Business Rules:]
This field should be the local section number only.
:::

---
### 21-22
Fields not collected. Must be delimited in template file.

---
### 23 - DUAL CREDIT STUDENT TAKE CREDIT
<p><Badge color="conditional" /> <Badge color="updateable" /> <Badge length={1} /></p>

Indicates whether a student took the credit from the dual credit course or not.

:::warning[Business Rules:]
Required if Course Template Field 32 - [DUAL CREDIT](docs/templates/course/course.mdx#32---dual-credit) = `Y`
:::

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

- `Y`
- `N`
</details>

**eScholar Name**: `GPA IMPACT`

---
### 24 - DUAL CREDIT COURSE PASS  
<p><Badge color="conditional" /> <Badge color="updateable" /> <Badge length={1} /></p>

Indicates whether the student passed the course or not.

:::warning[Business Rules:]
Required if Student Course Enrollment Template, Field 23 - [DUAL CREDIT STUDENT TAKE CREDIT](#23---dual-credit-student-take-credit) = `Y`
:::

<details open>
<summary>**Sample / Valid Value:**</summary>

- `Y` 
- `N`
</details>

## Rules

See the Rules Section of the Template Domain
